title: Vision. [No. 21]
creator_credit: Carl Carbone, Thomas Craven, Thomas Craven Films and United States Information Agency
brief_description: Cinemagazaine: the Grumman AG-CAT crop dusting aeroplane; the New York Zoological aquarium; Paul Lingren, an intaglio print-maker; Diana Wolkstein, “Official Storyteller of the City of New York”; the Kitt Peake observatory. Narrated by Fritz Weaver.
